title: I signed up for the Alpha client but cant use it
body: Hey, I signed up for the Alpha client and downloaded it, but it says I didn't signup and now I can't play. What do I do?

replies.body: If you signed up and your account wasn't approved yet,  submit a support ticket. Everyone who signed up should have been given access by now.
i cant even open my client. Any suggestions?
Did you install it and open the second Alpha Client icon on your desktop?
You didn't get accepted before applications were closed.
